Regulation Name(s): Reagent for detection of specific novel influenza A viruses
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for AVantage™ A/H5N1 Flu Test, a rapid immunochromatographic assay for qualitative detection of influenza A/H5N1 NS1 antigen in nasal or throat swabs and viral cultures.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for the in vitro qualitative detection of influenza A/H5N1 virus directly from symptomatic patient nasal or throat swab specimens or viral cultures for presumptive laboratory identification; prescription use in conjunction with other lab and clinical information.
